title: Help | Flipkart SDE3 or Walmart SSE
content:
Current: Fintech
Exp : 6.6+
CCTC: 33 LPA


Hi Folks,
Wanted to understand which would be better to join `Flipkart as SDE3 or Walmart as SSE`

pay >>> WLB >>> Learnings.

Company: Flipkart
Title/Level: SDE-3
Location: Bangalore
Salary: 38,00,000 INR
Signing Bonus: 3,00,000 INR 1st year (2 years lock-in)
Stock bonus: 24.8 L ESOPs spread equally over 4 years (1st year lock-in then monthly lock-in )
Bonus: 6,30,000 INR(15% of base)
Benefits: Flipkart Benefits

Company: Walmart
Title/Level: IN4 (Senior Software Engineer)
Location: Bangalore
Salary(INR): 37 lac per annum INR(Base)
Stock bonus: 9.75 lacs
Bonus: 9.75 lac per annum

Benefits: Standard Benefits
Relocation: Standard Walmart Relocation


Thanks

title: Coinbase | IC3 | India
content:
* Education: B.E. in CS
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: Interned at early to mid scale startups (total ~2years)
* Date of the Offer: Q2 2024
* Company: Coinbase
* Title/Level: IC3 (SDE1)
* Location: Remote, India
* Base: ₹ 31,00,000
* Stock bonus: ₹ 12,50,000 (Annual vested quarterly)
* Bonus: ₹ 1,34,000 (5% annual target bonus)
* Reimbursements: ₹ 3,26,000 (L&D, T&E, Connection, Care, ...)
* Total comp: ₹ 48,10,000
* Benefits: Extensive coverage of insurance, allowances and generous amount of leaves.
* Other details: Heard that signing bonus can be negotiated. Coinbase has transparent pay policy.  
* Background: State govt. college (tier 3), cf rating > 1900, comfortable in all parts of sdlc.

Interview: Process took about 4 months. Coding assesment(LC med-hard), psychiatric assesment, coding rounds(LC med-hard + production quality coding) and engineering manager round(In depth knowledge of jargons used in experience/cv). Finally the performance of all these round is reviewed by CEO/COO for final approval. 

Tip: Coding rounds are not generic dsa based rounds. You solve the given question, upon which you are given more extensions of the problems. Good coding standards are need to be kept in mind to easily decompose functionalities and extend the solution on new requirements. Be mindful of using jargons in managerial rounds as you will be taken in-depth based on what you say.

title: MakeMyTrip | Lead Software Engineer | Banglore
content:
Education: Btech in ECE
Years of Experience: 6
Current Compensation: 40 L CTC
Prior Experience: e-commerce

Date of the Offer: June 2024
Company: MakeMyTrip (MMT)
Title/Level: Lead
Location: BLR
Salary: Rs. 40.5L
Variable: Rs. 4.5L
Stock bonus: Rs 10L for 4 years
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): ~Rs. 47.5 L
Benefits: Nothing
Other details: The HR was very helpful and supportive throughout the process. They were ready to add 10% more after I rejected the offer.
Notice period: 2 months
Probationay period: 3 months
